welcome.title: Welcome to HemApp
welcome.subtitle: Your Personal Health Companion for Better Living
welcome.description: Track your health, monitor your diet, and get personalized AI-powered recommendations for managing hemoglobin levels and overall wellness.

aiConsultation.description: Get instant, personalized health advice from our AI assistant anytime.

dietMonitoring.title: Diet Monitoring
dietMonitoring.description: Track your meals and nutritional intake with smart recommendations. Examples: Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Snacks, and more.

healthTracking.title: Health Tracking
healthTracking.description: Monitor vital signs, symptoms, and health metrics in one place.

emergency.title: Emergency Support
emergency.description: Quick access to emergency contacts and nearby health facilities.

benefits.title: Why Choose HemApp?
items: Personalized health insights powered by AI
Secure and private health data management
